action.action-desc: Mr. Mike Garcia of California introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to repeal the limitation on deduction for State and local taxes, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the SALT Fairness Act of 2023.

section.header: Repeal of limitation on deduction for State and local, etc. taxes

subsection.text: Section 164(b) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 is amended by striking paragraph (6).
